title: [Innocent's End, The Felled]
description: A massive toy bear of hollowed metal dominates the middle of the area, covered in sickly green vines that constrict its body, the tendrils wrapping around a single deteriorated cabin set upon a small hill.  Tiny pin-covered dolls dangle from gnarled tree branches across the square, their cloth limbs dangling lifelessly alongside their broken button eyes.  The flattened grass across the walkway is littered with small toy soldiers, their wooden torsos and heads smashed into the dirt.
